html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10292024-09-20FIN
ActBretton Woods and Related Agreements Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Minister of Finance to Provide Financial Assistance to Ukraine
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO UKRAINE up to $400 million in the form of a sovereign loan during the period of time beginning on the day on which the Minister of Finance is satisfied that the requirements under the Act have been met, and ending on the earlier of March 31, 2026 and the day on which the Minister of Finance is no longer satisfied that those requirements are met.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order authorizing the Minister of Finance to provide FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE TO UKRAINE up to $400 million in the form of a sovereign loan during the period of time beginning on the day on which the Minister of Finance is satisfied that the requirements under the Act have been met, and ending on the earlier of March 31, 2026 and the day on which the Minister of Finance is no longer satisfied that those requirements are met.
